title: End of Century - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Fantasy   Romance   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Ability Steal   Adopted Children   Apocalypse   Army Building   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Cannibalism   Confident Protagonist   Cute Children   Discrimination   Familial Love   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Invisibility   Love at First Sight   Manly Gay Couple   Near-Death Experience   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Orphans   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Secrets   Seme Protagonist   Soldiers   Strong to Stronger   Teamwork   Transformation Ability   Unique Weapons   Weak to Strong   Zombies

description:
The end is coming. Hou Ying found that he lacked the memory of the first two days of the apocalypse so he was always searching for the truth. Later, he snagged a man instead of doing his job properly. 

This is the story of a zombie king who created the strongest team in the last days.>
